website_summaries.verdict: Fun, slightly edgy alternative to the Glo. Comfortable, but don't expect to run a marathon in them.
pros: Textile upper with ruffle and button detail
Textile lining, padded insole, synthetic outsole
cons: Body of the shoe seems to lose its shape over time

customer_reviews.title: Go a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I am a perfect size 8.75 if such a thing existed. I ordered these in a size 9 and they are still slightly snug, so I'd recommend ordering 1/2 larger than you normally wear. They are VERY comfy and with wear I've managed to make the size 9 work for me. The footbed is a squishy memory foam which I wasn't expecting. The only complaint I have is that I think they are bit overpriced for what they are. If you can get them on sale though, snatch them up! I would appreciate a "yes" click below if you found my review helpful :)
customer_reviews.author: CKayy

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these blowfish flats everyday, and I love them because they are cloth and 'breath' and mold easily to my foot. They don't hurt like leather flats. Since I wear these everyday, they do get worn out pretty quick so I re-order them every 4-6 months. I absolutely love them and I am okay with the wear-n-tear because of the convenience of slipping them on and them looking 'dressy' for work. It's like wearing slippers (almost) to work everyday! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Blowfish grey fabric ballet flat
customer_reviews.text: Because of the fabric/felt style on the shoe, this is actually more comfortable than most. The back doesnt cut into your heel like a lot of them. Overall, this is a very comfortable ballet flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: cute, stylish, and comfortable for the soles of your feet (has padding), but not so much for the back part of your heels. i'm guessing once "broken in" they should be fine but if you want to save yourself the pain, just get some of those sticky paddings that can be stuck on the inside of shoes. oh, and best of all, no dreaded toe cleavage...that might just be something that bugs me though. all in all, great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/2-size too large
customer_reviews.text: Runs 1/2 size too large. I normally wear a 7.5 but had to return them because they only fit with super thick socks. So I exchanged them for a 7, which are definitely a little more snug, but don't slip off my heels. I've owned Blowfish flats before, and they tend to stretch out a little, due to being a fabric shoe. But they are super cute and I love them! I would give them 5 stars if I didn't have to do the exchange.
customer_reviews.author: K Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 in every shoe. I can barely fit my foot in these. They are cute but I'm not going to order a 10 in hopes they will fit and possibly have to return another pair. So sad because they are really cute shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair of Blowfish flats I've purchased. I've loved the others, I'm just OK with these. The upper body of the shoe seems flimsy and is losing its shape. They're still fine for occasional shoes, but I wouldn't expect them to hold up if I wore them daily.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: So close, but too small
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, but they were just slightly too snug. I normally wear 9.5 so I bought the size 10. They were just snug in the toes and the width. Love the fabric and if you have narrow feet, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, versatile flats.
customer_reviews.text: Blowfish flats are my favorite shoes and these are no exception. They are very comfortable and cute. They can be dressed up or down to match almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: britanie89

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these in gray and get so many compliments. I needed a pair of black shoes and love this style. The fit is comfortable and exactly the size I purchase for shoes at the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: D Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes, however, they were too tight. I normally wear a 9, but I think the ruffle detail makes these much tighter across the bridge. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Soles worn out immediately
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for about two weeks, and have worn them to a concert and to work a few times. (Perhaps 8 blocks walking total). The soles are completely worn down (to the point of holes). Super poor quality for that much money.
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I lave these shoes fit great and cool style in a flat
customer_reviews.author: joy b norcia

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for my feet so I returned. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for my feet so I returned. They also fit strange on my foot, weird gaps of space.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and the bottoms are so soft and gel like. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Muth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very comfortable. I wear them with no show socks, which is perfect. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: LauraCOMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them!! I got a 7.5 and normally wear a 7 or 7.5. so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: S. Soucy

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfy and soft. They ran ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfy and soft. They ran a little small for me though, I usually wear a 6 or 6.5, had to get a 7 in these.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Would love half sizes because I love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: While they are a little big, the shoe did not come in half sizes so had to go up a half a size. This would account the discrepancy. Would love half sizes because I love the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: I have this exact shoe in the same size but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this exact shoe in the same size but different color so I figured I was safe ordering these but I cant wear them because they are much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this shoe. It seems to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this shoe. It seems to fit her. She wore out the first pair teaching kindergarten. Five other pairs of other brands didn't work. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that they didn't fit and now I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Great fit with good cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I usually wear 8.5, but these run big. So I had to get 7.5. Given that it's fabric, it does stretch out. It doesn't hurt the back of my heels like some other flats. Goes great with jeans, capris, or skirts. I liked these so much I bought the same thing in gray.
customer_reviews.author: preebhat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Blowfish ballet flats before and my old pair's bottom fell out during washing, so I wanted another pair. This was the closest I could get to my original flats, and they might even be cuter. I wear them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, I orded based on reviews that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, I orded based on reviews that the shoes ran big. Not in all the blowfish do they run big, these are smaller if you wear a whole size I suggest you go up a half.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grace

product_meta.title: Blowfish Malibu Women's Garamel Ballet Flat
product_meta.description:
Flat

Blowfish.cool shoes for cool girls! A fresh line of young contemporary shoes brought to you by designers who travel the world for inspiration and forward trends to bring happiness and cool looks to your feet. One pair and you'll be hooked. Just give the line a try and see. Not only fun, but comfy too. Thanks for fishing!
